title: Serverless csv data load template
description: Creates a serverless pattern to store and process csv data using s3, sqs, lambda and dynamodb services

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The AWS CDK  template deploys s3 bucket, SQS queue, lambda and DynamoDB table.
SQS queue is configured to listen to s3 create object events
Lambda is configured to read messages from the SQS queues, process them and insert records into DynamoDB table named EmployeeInfo.

bullets.text: S3 event notification types and detinations
Configuring SQS queue to use with Lambda

text: See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Shashi Shankar
authors.bio: Shashi Shankar is a Sr Cloud Architect at PwC Advisory services
